Legal_Issue: Whether the immigration officer failed to treat the applicants fairly or consider their actual circumstances in Afghanistan
Evidence_Type: Applicants' claims regarding conditions in Afghanistan
Basis_of_Claim: Serious effect from conflict or human rights violations in Afghanistan
Evaluation_Standard: Reasonable prospect of a durable solution outside Canada
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Concerns characterized as economic/social rather than due to conflict or human rights violations
Application_Factor: Proof of no durable solution outside Canada
Authority: Immigration officer, Federal Court on review
Decision_Review_Issue: Failure to consider individual circumstances and fairness
Cause_of_Refusal: Concerns deemed economic/social, not linked to conflict or human rights abuses
Evidentiary_Issues: Officer considered UNHCR repatriation as viable solution
Procedural_Fairness: Assessed as satisfied by the court
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Applicants challenged denial based on fairness and relevance of evidence
